name: NextCellent Simple History
author: niknetniko

sections.description:
NextCellent Simple History logs events related to NextCellent in the Simple History plugin.

Currently, it logs following events:

  • Adding galleries
  • Updating galleries
  • Deleting galleries
  • Adding pages for galleries
  • Adding images to galleries
  • Adding albums
  • Editing albums
  • Deleting albums
  • Updating the NextCellent options
  • Deleting images
  • Updating images

Note: this only works with NextCellent Gallery, not with NextGEN Gallery.

Requirements

NextCellent Simple History has some requirements to be able to run:

  • NextCellent 1.9.27 or higher
  • PHP 5.4 or higher (5.5 or higher is recommended, since 5.4 is no longer supported by PHP)
  • WordPress 4.0 or higher

Languages

So far NextCellent Simple History is available to:

  • Dutch
  • English
  • Polish (thanks to Frank P. Walentynowicz)
  • Danish (thomasdk81)

If you want to help, please contact me.

Source code

The source code is available on BitBucket.

Feel free to contribute.

Credits

The plugin icon was adapted from an icon made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com is licensed under Creative Commons BY 3.0.
sections.changelog:
2.0.1

  • Fixes for use with other plugins

2.0.0

  • Improved loading of the plugin and detection of Simple History and NextCellent.
  • Fixed some warnings.
  • Fixed some of the translations

Warning! Starting with this version, PHP 5.4 or higher is required. Warning! Starting with this version, WordPress 4.0 or higher is required.

1.1.1

  • Danish translation. Thanks to thomasdk81

1.1.0

  • Fix for translations
  • Fix for admin message appearing everywhere
  • Updated translations

Thanks to Frank P. Walentynowicz for his assistance in this update.

1.0.2

  • Fix for error when NextCellent is disabled.

1.0.1

  • Tested up to WordPress 4.2
  • Polish translation (thanks to Frank P. Walentynowicz!)

1.0.0

  • First version!
